eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 03:17 PM ON JAN 3, 2026 Effective until 11:17 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Tempe Police Department is looking for 92 year old Hispanic male Apolonio Romero last seen on 01/02/2026 at 6 PM wearing a denim jacket. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
